content: **note archive version link required due to wrong pdf being linked to this pattern on lion brand site which is a completely different beachbag pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ this bag features a shoulder strap attached from the base to the top of the bag it has a drawstring closure 12 tall 10 base lion brand terryspun article no 970 120 yd skeins #124 oatmeal mc - 1 skein #098 ivory cc -1 skein crochet hook size n u s 00 u k 9 00 mm gauge approx 4 single_crochet = 4 shown with rolled crochet hat 2 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rolled-crochet-hat
